amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect and strengthen the Department of Veterans Affairs, hire more health care professionals for the Department, and ensure quality and timely access to health care for all veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 474 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 474 proposed by Senator Sanders. (consideration: CR S1765-1766; text: CR S1765) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect and strengthen the Department of Veterans Affairs, hire more health care professionals for the Department, and ensure quality and timely access to health care for all veterans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 474 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 474 proposed by Senator Sanders.
